commit.message:
trans-types.c (gfc_init_types): Use Fortran-90-style type names, with kinds.

	* trans-types.c (gfc_init_types): Use Fortran-90-style type
	names, with kinds.

From-SVN: r130261

files.patch:

+	* trans-types.c (gfc_init_types): Use Fortran-90-style type
+	names, with kinds.
